Title: SharePoint YouTube Web Part
Description:
The SharePoint You Tube Web Part allows end users to place the web part on the page and play any video within You Tube.

The majority of API calls have been mapped allowing the following features:
- Play lists
- Theme / styling
- Seek positions
- JavaScript API's
HomeWiki:
Blog: http://ghamson.wordpress.com
Twitter: http://twitter.com/ghamson
